servinfo.title: Registration Procedure for the Fuel Injector Calibration Code
servinfo.ptxt: After one or more fuel injector(s) are replaced, register the fuel injector calibration code of each fuel injector manually by reading the fuel injector calibration code on each fuel injector using SUZUKI scan tool (Refer to “SUZUKI Scan Tool Operator’s Manual”).

After replacing or reprogramming ECM, be sure to register calibration codes of all four fuel injectors to ECM all at once manually by reading the calibration code on each fuel injector and selecting “Cylinder Number 1 – 4” under “Replace Injector” on “SUZUKI scan tool”.
